Class StoreControllerGUI

java.lang.Object
controller.StoreControllerGUI
public class StoreControllerGUI extends Object
Main GUI controller for the convenience store application. Manages navigation between different screens and coordinates interactions between the model and view layers.
Version:
2.1
Author:
BENITO_RAMOS
